testcase.name: As a choosy surfer
testcase.system-out: Given I like to surf in any 2 beaches <Out of top ten> of Sydney............passed And I only like to surf on any 2 days specifically "Thursday & Friday" in next 16 Days.passed When I look up the the weather forecast for the next 16 days using POSTAL CODES.passed Then I check to if see the temperature is between "20" and "30".............passed And I check to see if UV index is <= 3......................................passed And I Pick two spots based on suitable weather forecast for the day.........passed
